item.title: 001. Dublin
item.description:
Dublin, Ireland #

  • City: ÈÉΩÊüèÊûó (dou1 paak3 lam4)
  • Country: üáÆüá™ ÊÑõÁàæËò≠ (oi3 ji5 laan4)

Dublin is the capital city of Ireland, located on the country’s east coast where the River Liffey flows into the sea. üåä It’s the largest city in Ireland and has been the country’s most important city for hundreds of years! üèôÔ∏è

Where Is Dublin? üìç #

Dublin sits near the middle of Ireland’s eastern coastline. It’s like the heart of Ireland, with many important roads and railways connecting it to other parts of the country. üöÇ The beautiful River Liffey runs right through the middle of the city before emptying into the Irish Sea. üåä

item.title: 002. Prague

Prague, Czech Republic #

Prague is the capital and largest city of the Czech Republic, a country located right in the middle of Europe. People often call Prague the “Heart of Europe” ‚ù§Ô∏è because it sits almost in the center of the continent! The city is built along the beautiful Vltava river üåä and is famous for its colorful buildings üåà and historic bridges üåâ.

item.title: 003. Stockholm
item.description:
Stockholm, Sweden #

  • City: ÊñØÂæ∑Âì•ÁàæÊë© (si1 dak1 go1 ji5 mo1)
  • Country: üá∏üá™ ÁëûÂÖ∏ (seoi6 din2)

Stockholm is a beautiful city that sits on a collection of islands in Sweden. It’s the capital and largest city of Sweden, located in Northern Europe. Stockholm is a special place with lots of fascinating history, delicious food, and exciting things to see and do! üåü

Where in the World is Stockholm? üåç #

Stockholm is located in Sweden, which is part of Scandinavia in Northern Europe. The city sits at a special spot where Lake M√§laren meets the Baltic Sea. What makes Stockholm super cool is that it’s built across 14 different islands that are all connected by 57 bridges! üåâ The exact location of Stockholm is 59.334591¬∞ north and 18.063240¬∞ east on your globe or map. This unique island layout gives Stockholm the nickname “Beauty on Water.” üíß

item.title: 004. Seoul, South Korea
item.description:
Seoul, South Korea #

  • City: È¶ñÁàæ (sau2 ji5)
  • Country: üá∞üá∑ ÈüìÂúã (hon4 gwok3)

Seoul is the capital city of South Korea, a fascinating country in East Asia üåè. This vibrant city is full of interesting sights üåü, delicious food üç≤, and amazing people!

Where Is Seoul? üìç #

Seoul is located in the northwestern part of South Korea, quite close to the border with North Korea üó∫Ô∏è. It sits along the Han River üèûÔ∏è, which divides the city into two halves. If you look at a map, you can find Seoul at these coordinates: 37.532600, 127.024612.

item.title: 005. New York City
item.description:
New York City, USA #

  • City: Á¥êÁ¥ÑÂ∏Ç (nau2 joek3 si5)
  • Country: üá∫üá∏ ÁæéÂúã (mei5 gwok3)

New York City, also known as NYC or “The Big Apple,” is a fascinating place full of skyscrapers üèôÔ∏è, exciting attractions üé°, and diverse people. It’s one of the most famous cities in the world and has lots to discover! üåç

Where is New York City? üìç #

New York City is located in the northeastern part of the United States üá∫üá∏, at the southern tip of New York State. The city sits where the Hudson and East rivers meet New York Bay üåä, creating one of the world’s largest natural harbors. The city is made up of five areas called boroughs: Manhattan, Brooklyn, the Bronx, Queens, and Staten Island. Most of New York City is actually built on three islands üèùÔ∏è - Manhattan, Staten Island, and western Long Island.

Lima is the capital and largest city of Peru üáµüá™, a country in South America üåé. This amazing city sits between the Pacific Ocean üåä and the Andes Mountains ‚õ∞Ô∏è, in a desert zone where three rivers meet - the Chill√≥n, R√≠mac, and Lur√≠n. Even though Lima is only about 8 miles (13 kilometers) from the ocean, it sits 500 feet (152 meters) above sea level.

item.title: 007. Florence
item.description:
florence, italy #

  • City: ‰ΩõÁæÖÂÄ´ÊñØ (fat6 lo4 leon4 si1)
  • Country: üáÆüáπ Áæ©Â§ßÂà© (ji6 daai6 lei6)

Florence is a beautiful historic city located in north-central Italy, in a region called Tuscany. Let’s explore this amazing place that’s full of art, history, and delicious food! üé®üçù

Where is Florence? üìç #

Florence sits on the banks of the River Arno, surrounded by pretty hills. It’s about 160 feet above sea level and serves as the capital city of Tuscany. If you look at a map of Italy, you’ll find Florence about 65 miles south of Bologna and 190 miles southeast of Milan. The city has coordinates of 43.769562, 11.255814, which are like its special address on Earth! üåçüó∫Ô∏è

Reykjavik, Iceland #

Reykjavik is a fascinating city filled with colorful buildings üè†üåà, interesting people üë•, and stunning natural surroundings üåøüèûÔ∏è. As Iceland’s capital and largest city, it has so much to offer for curious young explorers! üß≠üëßüßí

Where in the World is Reykjavik? üåç #

Reykjavik is located in the southwestern part of Iceland, sitting on the shores of Faxafl√≥i bay üåä. Did you know it’s the northernmost capital city in the world? üß≠‚ùÑÔ∏è That means it’s farther north than any other country’s main city üó∫Ô∏è. The city covers about 200 square kilometers of land, which is plenty of space for its residents üè°.

item.title: 009. Singapore
item.description:
Singapore, Singapore #

  • City: Êñ∞Âä†Âù° (san1 gaa3 bo1)
  • Country: üá∏üá¨ Êñ∞Âä†Âù° (san1 gaa3 bo1)

Singapore is a small island city-state located in Southeast Asia, right at the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula. Even though it’s one of the 20 smallest countries in the world, Singapore is packed with amazing things to see and do! üåè‚ú®

Where Is It? üìç #

Singapore sits just 85 miles north of the Equator and consists of one main diamond-shaped island plus about 60 tiny islets. It’s separated from Malaysia by the Straits of Johor to the north and from Indonesia by the Singapore Strait to the south. üåäüó∫Ô∏è
